name: custom-skills
description: Ted's custom Claude Code skills collection - workflow automation, planning, visualization, and productivity tools

skills.name: agent-creator
skills.description: Create custom Claude Code agents (subagents). Use when creating new agents, adding agents, writing subagents, or setting up agent files.

skills.name: agent-file-pattern
skills.description: Agent communication patterns for passing data between agents efficiently. Use when orchestrating multi-agent workflows or designing agents that accept file inputs.

skills.name: ai-config-admin
skills.description: Reference guide for AI CLI tool config locations (Claude, Codex, Gemini, Cursor). Use when finding configs, understanding config structure, or creating new skills.

skills.name: ast-grep
skills.description: AST-based code search and refactoring tool. Use for code migration, bulk refactoring, renaming across codebase, or structural code transformation.

skills.name: browser-automation
skills.description: Browser automation tools - agent-browser CLI and chrome-devtools MCP. Use for web scraping, form automation, testing flows, and debugging.

skills.name: chezmoi
skills.description: Manage dotfiles with chezmoi for cross-machine configuration management. Use when setting up dotfiles, syncing configs across machines, or managing secrets.

skills.name: config-backup
skills.description: Backup and manage AI CLI tool configurations with chezmoi and local fallback. Use when modifying settings, adding MCP servers, or syncing configs.

skills.name: excalidraw-diagram
skills.description: Generate Excalidraw diagrams from text content for Obsidian. Use when creating diagrams, flowcharts, mind maps in Excalidraw format.

skills.name: google-workspace
skills.description: Google Workspace MCP usage guide. Use when working with Gmail, Google Drive, Docs, Sheets, Calendar, or Tasks.

skills.name: graph-loop
skills.description: Execute multi-stage workflows with conditional loops, parallel execution, and quality gates through graph-based orchestration.

skills.name: mcp-admin
skills.description: Use when managing MCP servers, debugging MCP connection failures, adding/removing MCPs, or troubleshooting AI CLI configs.

skills.name: mermaid-visualizer
skills.description: Transform text content into professional Mermaid diagrams for presentations and documentation. Supports flowcharts, architectures, mindmaps.

skills.name: notion-to-zettel
skills.description: Use when syncing notes from Notion to local Zettelkasten vault. Triggers include sync notion, extract from notion, import notes from notion.

skills.name: obsidian-canvas-creator
skills.description: Create Obsidian Canvas files from text content, supporting MindMap and freeform layouts for interactive canvases.

skills.name: pf
skills.description: Shortcut for file-based planning (Manus-style). Creates task_plan.md, findings.md, and progress.md for complex multi-step tasks.

skills.name: senior-devops
skills.description: Comprehensive DevOps skill for CI/CD, infrastructure automation, containerization, and cloud platforms. Use for pipelines, IaC, deployment automation.

skills.name: team
skills.description: Multi-agent orchestration system dispatching tasks to specialized roles (Oracle, Librarian, Coder, Reviewer) using optimal models.

skills.name: team-loop
skills.description: Hybrid orchestration combining team's role-based parallel dispatch with graph-loop's iterative refinement.

skills.name: tldr
skills.description: Semantic code analysis tool. Use for searching code by behavior, analyzing call graphs, finding callers, or getting LLM-optimized context.

skills.name: zettelkasten-note
skills.description: Use when persisting knowledge, capturing learnings, documenting solutions, or creating reference notes in Obsidian.

agents.name: codex
agents.description: Use for code review, generating code prototypes with diffs, or getting a second opinion on code changes. Codex excels at depth.

agents.name: gemini
agents.description: Use for large codebase analysis, cross-file pattern detection, mapping dependencies, or complex bug root cause analysis. Gemini excels at breadth.
